item.title: How to remove a field in a JSON document in MySQL
item.description: You can remove a field from JSON document in MySQL with the JSON_REMOVE function.

item.title: How to remove an item from a JSON array in PostgreSQL®?
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the - operator to remove an item from an array.

item.title: How to remove nulls JSON object in PostgreSQL®?
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, you can use the json_strip_nulls (jsonb_strip_nulls for JSONB) function to remove the null values.
